structure.unit: REPORT AND ACCOUNTING OF STATE FUNDS BY LOCAL OFFICERS

law.catch_line: When funds to be reported and paid in.
law.text: Except as provided in KRS 134.191, all county, district and other local officers authorized to collect money for the state shall, on the last day of each month, report to the Finance and Administration Cabinet and pay into the State Treasury all such funds on hand.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 55, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4606a-5.
